name: pinentry

variants.name: gui
variants.description: GUI to use for passphrase entry

description:
pinentry is a small collection of dialog programs that allow GnuPG to
read passphrases and PIN numbers in a secure manner. There are versions
for the common GTK and Qt toolkits as well as for the text terminal
(Curses).

dependencies.name: gnuconfig
dependencies.description:
The GNU config.guess and config.sub scripts versioned by timestamp.
This package can be used as a build dependency for autotools packages
that ship a tarball with outdated config.guess and config.sub files.

dependencies.name: libgpg-error
dependencies.description: Common error values for all GnuPG components.

dependencies.name: libassuan
dependencies.description: Libassuan is a small library implementing the so-called Assuan protocol.

dependencies.name: ncurses
dependencies.description:
The ncurses (new curses) library is a free software emulation of curses
in System V Release 4.0, and more. It uses terminfo format, supports
pads and color and multiple highlights and forms characters and
function-key mapping, and has all the other SYSV-curses enhancements
over BSD curses.

dependencies.name: gtkplus
dependencies.description:
The GTK+ package contains libraries used for creating graphical user
interfaces for applications.

dependencies.name: qt
dependencies.description: Qt is a comprehensive cross-platform C++ application framework.

dependencies.name: fltk
dependencies.description:
FLTK (pronounced "fulltick") is a cross-platform C++ GUI toolkit for
UNIX/Linux (X11), Microsoft Windows, and MacOS X. FLTK provides modern
GUI functionality without the bloat and supports 3D graphics via OpenGL
and its built-in GLUT emulation. FLTK is designed to be small and
modular enough to be statically linked, but works fine as a shared
library. FLTK also includes an excellent UI builder called FLUID that
can be used to create applications in minutes.
